about_the_game: This demo is of the first build of the game. During future development I will be slowly updating the demo to go up to version 2.0 of the game.
detailed_description: This demo is of the first build of the game. During future development I will be slowly updating the demo to go up to version 2.0 of the game.
name: Realms of Supremacy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700HQ or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This demo is of the first build of the game. During future development I will be slowly updating the demo to go up to version 2.0 of the game.
